poem:
*In the Absence of Flags*

Beneath a vacant blue sky,  
the UN flag whispers,  
unfurled above an echoing street.  
Empty chairs bear witness—  
voices now distant,  
silenced by a celebration  
of absence.  
In the dust left behind,  
questions stir,  
unresolved,  
like leaves in the unsettled air.
